name: 风之界限 the border of wind
name_original: 风之界限 the border of wind
description:
The Kingdom of Dorur, which originally lived on this land for hundreds of years, has always been a symbol of peace. "But these were brought to an end by a strange attack, and the assailant was believed to have completely eliminated the darkness. When the voice of the shadow reappeared, the city of the kingdom was in danger, and now he led the descendants of the hunter, Art, and his friends, to save all this."


· Sell items in special areas and buy and sell unwanted items on your body.



· Experience rich plot exploration and help others earn rich rewards.



· Buying the consumables you need is the best choice for ensuring safety during your journey.



Please remember to save your progress in a timely manner, as more treasures await discovery.
